message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it's only fair to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $950,000. We're confident this offer will allow you to secure the value you seek without breaking the bank.

Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $950,000 is a bit more than I'm comfortable with at this time. Given the value I see in the product, I'm willing to pay $850,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise, allowing us both to benefit from the transaction.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I am prepared to consider your offer further. My counteroffer is $900,000 for the product. This price aims to strike a balance between reflecting its true value and accommodating your budget constraints.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $900,000 is still slightly above my target. I'm willing to offer $875,000 for the product.  This is a fair price considering the value we both see in this deal.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your commitment to finding a mutually beneficial solution. My proposal is to set the product price at $890,000. This figure takes into account the value you see in the product while also ensuring a reasonable profit margin for me. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.
